title: Talking Back - all the following are true EXCEPT

content.question: All of the following are true of the first paragraph EXCEPT:

choices.label: It conveys one of the main ideas that the author develops in the passage.
It describes the method of upbringing in the author's childhood environment.
It defines key terms that will be further explored in the passage.
It reveals the author's dismissal of the community in which she was raised.

content.answer: It reveals the author's dismissal of the community in which she was raised.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
